sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* User_Mysql.xml user.getUserCount */ COUNT(1) FROM TB_USER_MASTER A , TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USER_TYPE = B.USER_TYPE AND A.USER_ROLE = B.USER_ROLE
AND A.INSERT_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID#
AND A.USER_ID = #SEARCH_USER_ID#
AND A.ORIGINAL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_ORIGINAL_NM#,'%')
AND CONCAT(A.USER_TYPE, A.USER_ROLE) = #SEARCH_USER_TYPE_ROLE#

SELECT /* User_Mysql.xml user.getUserList */ A.USER_ID , A.USER_TYPE , A.USER_ROLE , B.USER_ROLE_NM , A.BIZ_ENTITY_ID , A.ORIGINAL_NM , A.PASSPORT_NM , A.SEX , A.BIRTH_YEAR , A.BIRTH_MONTH , A.BIRTH_DAY , A.HOME_ADDR_COUNTRY , A.HOME_ADDR_PROVINCE , A.HOME_ADDR_CITY , A.HOME_ADDR_FULL , A.COMP_ADDR_COUNTRY , A.COMP_ADDR_PROVINCE , A.COMP_ADDR_CITY , A.COMP_ADDR_FULL , A.USE_LANGUAGE_CD , FN_GET_CODE_NM('USING_LANG', A.USE_LANGUAGE_CD, #LANG_CD#) AS USE_LANGUAGE_NM , A.SNS_TYPE , A.SNS_ID , A.PHONE_COUNTRY_NO , A.PHONE_NO , A.EMAIL_ID , A.BANK_NAME , A.ACCOUNT_NO , A.RECOMMENDER_ID , DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(A.LAST_ORDER_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_ORDER_DATE FROM TB_USER_MASTER A , TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.USER_TYPE = B.USER_TYPE AND A.USER_ROLE = B.USER_ROLE
AND A.INSERT_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID#
AND A.USER_ID = #SEARCH_USER_ID#
AND A.ORIGINAL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#SEARCH_ORIGINAL_NM#,'%')
AND CONCAT(A.USER_TYPE, A.USER_ROLE) = #SEARCH_USER_TYPE_ROLE#
ORDER BY A.INSERT_DT DESC
SELECT /* User_Mysql.xml user.getUserDetail */ CONCAT(USER_TYPE, USER_ROLE) USER_TYPE_ROLE , USER_ROLE_NM FROM TB_USER_ROLE_MASTER ORDER BY USER_TYPE, USER_ROLE

SELECT /* User_Mysql.xml user.getUserDetail */ A.USER_ID , CONCAT(USER_TYPE, USER_ROLE) AS USER_TYPE_ROLE , A.BIZ_ENTITY_ID , A.ORIGINAL_NM , A.PASSPORT_NM , A.SEX , A.BIRTH_YEAR , A.BIRTH_MONTH , A.BIRTH_DAY , A.HOME_ADDR_COUNTRY , A.HOME_ADDR_PROVINCE , A.HOME_ADDR_CITY , A.HOME_ADDR_FULL , A.COMP_ADDR_COUNTRY , A.COMP_ADDR_PROVINCE , A.COMP_ADDR_CITY , A.COMP_ADDR_FULL , A.USE_LANGUAGE_CD , A.SNS_TYPE , A.SNS_ID , A.PHONE_COUNTRY_NO , A.PHONE_NO , A.EMAIL_ID , A.BANK_NAME , A.ACCOUNT_NO , A.RECOMMENDER_ID , DATE_FORMAT(str_to_date(A.LAST_ORDER_DATE, '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_ORDER_DATE FROM TB_USER_MASTER A WHERE A.USER_ID= #SEARCH_USER_ID#

SELECT /* User_Mysql.xml user.getUserExistYn */ CASE WHEN count(*) = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END EXIST_YN FROM TB_USER_MASTER WHERE 1 = 1
AND USER_ID= #USER_ID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT /* User_Mysql.xml user.insertUser */ INTO TB_USER_MASTER ( USER_ID , USER_PSWD , USER_TYPE , USER_ROLE , BIZ_ENTITY_ID , ORIGINAL_NM , PASSPORT_NM , SEX , BIRTH_YEAR , BIRTH_MONTH , BIRTH_DAY , HOME_ADDR_COUNTRY , HOME_ADDR_PROVINCE , HOME_ADDR_CITY , HOME_ADDR_FULL , COMP_ADDR_COUNTRY , COMP_ADDR_PROVINCE , COMP_ADDR_CITY , COMP_ADDR_FULL , USE_LANGUAGE_CD , SNS_TYPE , SNS_ID , PHONE_COUNTRY_NO , PHONE_NO , EMAIL_ID , BANK_NAME , ACCOUNT_NO , RECOMMENDER_ID , INSERT_USER_ID , INSERT_DT) VALUES ( #USER_ID# , PASSWORD(#USER_PSWD#) , #USER_TYPE# , #USER_ROLE# , #BIZ_ENTITY_ID# , #ORIGINAL_NM# , #PASSPORT_NM# , #SEX# , #BIRTH_YEAR# , #BIRTH_MONTH# , #BIRTH_DAY# , #HOME_ADDR_COUNTRY# , #HOME_ADDR_PROVINCE# , #HOME_ADDR_CITY# , #HOME_ADDR_FULL# , #COMP_ADDR_COUNTRY# , #COMP_ADDR_PROVINCE# , #COMP_ADDR_CITY# , #COMP_ADDR_FULL# , #USE_LANGUAGE_CD# , #SNS_TYPE# , #SNS_ID# , #PHONE_COUNTRY_NO# , #PHONE_NO# , #EMAIL_ID# , #BANK_NAME# , #ACCOUNT_NO# , #RECOMMENDER_ID# , #LOGIN_ID# , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /* User_Mysql.xml user.updateUser */ TB_USER_MASTER SET USER_PSWD = PASSWORD(#USER_PSWD#) , USER_TYPE = #USER_TYPE# , USER_ROLE = #USER_ROLE# , BIZ_ENTITY_ID = #BIZ_ENTITY_ID# , ORIGINAL_NM = #ORIGINAL_NM# , PASSPORT_NM = #PASSPORT_NM# , SEX = #SEX# , BIRTH_YEAR = #BIRTH_YEAR# , BIRTH_MONTH = #BIRTH_MONTH# , BIRTH_DAY = #BIRTH_DAY# , HOME_ADDR_COUNTRY = #HOME_ADDR_COUNTRY# , HOME_ADDR_PROVINCE = #HOME_ADDR_PROVINCE# , HOME_ADDR_CITY = #HOME_ADDR_CITY# , HOME_ADDR_FULL = #HOME_ADDR_FULL# , COMP_ADDR_COUNTRY = #COMP_ADDR_COUNTRY# , COMP_ADDR_PROVINCE = #COMP_ADDR_PROVINCE# , COMP_ADDR_CITY = #COMP_ADDR_CITY# , COMP_ADDR_FULL = #COMP_ADDR_FULL# , USE_LANGUAGE_CD = #USE_LANGUAGE_CD# , SNS_TYPE = #SNS_TYPE# , SNS_ID = #SNS_ID# , PHONE_COUNTRY_NO = #PHONE_COUNTRY_NO# , PHONE_NO = #PHONE_NO# , EMAIL_ID = #EMAIL_ID# , BANK_NAME = #BANK_NAME# , ACCOUNT_NO = #ACCOUNT_NO# , RECOMMENDER_ID = #RECOMMENDER_ID# , UPDATE_USER_ID = #LOGIN_ID# , UPDATE_DT = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE /* User_Mysql.xml user.deleteUser */ FROM TB_USER_MASTER WHERE USER_ID = #USER_ID#
